Class StartGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • StartGame

  • class StartGame
extends java.lang.Object
    It is the main class where the execution begins. It binds the game together by channeling the flow of execution through multiple classes and data flows.
    Version:
    ( 1.2 [26/12/15])
    Author:
    (Mehul Ahal)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void display(Board guessBoard, Board playerBoard)
      Method display prints both the Boards, of the PLAYER and of the COMPUTER (AI), together in a readable format.
      static int[] hitHist(Board boards)
      Method hitHist returns a histogram of hits on each Ship in the form of an int[5].
      static boolean isGameOver(Board commBoard, Board playerBoard)
      Method isGameOver returns true if all the Ships of any of the two Boards are sunk (Board.all Ships.isSunk == true), or false otherwise.
      static boolean isSunk(Board boards)
      Method isSunk returns true if a Ship of a Board has been sunk (any Ship.isSunk == true), or false otherwise.
      static boolean isSunk(Ship ship)
      Method isSunk returns true if a specific Ship has been sunk (before the actual modification of 'Ship.isSunk = true' takes place).
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Method main is where the execution begins from and it controls all the functions.
      static void plotCord(Board workBoard, Board accompanyBoard, java.awt.Point point, boolean isHit)
      Method plotCord plots the character of on a Board, respective of if it is a 'hit' or a 'miss' (≹ or ◌).
      static void printRules()
      Method printRules prints the ruls of the game for the information of the PLAYER.
      static void printSleep(java.lang.String words)
      Method printSleep prints a given String slowly, character-by-character, giving an impression of it being typed on-spot.
      static void welcome(java.lang.String name)
      Method welcome gives the introduction of the game to a PLAYER.

        public static boolean isGameOver(Board commBoard,
                                 Board playerBoard)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Method isGameOver returns true if all the Ships of any of the two Boards are sunk (Board.all Ships.isSunk == true), or false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        commBoard - the guessing Board
        playerBoard - the Player's Board
        Returns:
        win=true/false otherwise

        Returns:

      • isSunk

        public static boolean isSunk(Ship ship)
        Method isSunk returns true if a specific Ship has been sunk (before the actual modification of 'Ship.isSunk = true' takes place).
        Parameters:
        ship - any Ship
        Returns:
        true=sunk/false=otherwise
